en.terms.title: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy â€“ URL-LINK.ORG
en.terms.1.title: 1. Introduction and Definitions
en.terms.1.p1.text: These Terms of Use and Privacy Policy ("the Terms") govern the use of the URL-LINK.ORG website ("the Site"), including the services provided therein. Reading and using the Site constitutes full and unconditional acceptance of all the Terms. If you do not agree to any or all of the Terms, you may not use the Site.
en.terms.1.def.1: "The Site" â€“ A platform for URL shortening, QR code generation, and statistics analysis, operated under the domain URL-LINK.ORG.
en.terms.1.def.2: "The Operator" â€“ The owners and administrators of the Site.
en.terms.1.def.3: "User(s)" â€“ Any person or entity using the Site or its services.
en.terms.1.def.4: "Services" â€“ URL shortening, QR code generation, click tracking, and usage data.
en.terms.1.def.5: "Content" â€“ Any information, text, image, video, code, graphics, or other material displayed on or uploaded to the Site.
en.terms.2.title: 2. Validity and Changes to the Terms
en.terms.2.p1.text: Browsing and using the Site constitutes full acceptance of all the Terms, including explicit and implied conditions.
en.terms.2.p2.text: The Operator may change, update, or amend the Terms at any time without prior notice. Any change takes effect upon publication on the Site; continued use of the Site constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
en.terms.3.title: 3. License of Use
en.terms.3.p1.text: A personal, limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license is granted for personal use of the Services, subject to these Terms.
en.terms.3.li.1: Copying, duplication, sale, rental, distribution, or creation of derivative works from the Services or Content.
en.terms.3.li.2: Reverse engineering, bypassing security mechanisms, use of bots, scraping, or any automated data collection.
en.terms.3.li.3: Shortening/uploading illegal content, spam, malware, offensive or infringing content.
en.terms.4.title: 4. Description of Services and Disclaimer
en.terms.4.p1.text: The Services are provided as-is and as-available without any warranties, expressed or implied. The Operator does not guarantee continuous availability, accuracy, fitness for a particular purpose, or freedom from violations.
en.terms.4.p2.text: The Operator may remove, restrict, or block any content or link suspected of violating the Terms at any time without notice.
en.terms.4.p3.text: The Site may include links to third-party websites. The Operator is not responsible for their content, security, privacy policy, or availability. Use of them is at the userâ€™s sole risk.
en.terms.5.title: 5. Privacy and Data Security
en.terms.5.p1.text: The Site may collect statistical and aggregated usage data (such as usage and clicks) that do not personally identify users, for the purpose of improving the service.
en.terms.5.p2.text: Personal information provided by the user (such as name or email address) will be stored in the Operatorâ€™s database and used only for operating the Site, contacting the user, providing mailing services with consent, and improving the services. Removal from mailing lists can be requested at any time.
en.terms.5.p3.text: The Operator undertakes to keep personal information confidential and not transfer it to third parties, except as required by law, court order, or with the userâ€™s consent.
en.terms.5.p4.text: The Operator uses accepted security measures (such as SSL and server security). However, no guarantee of absolute protection against hacks, failures, or malfunctions is made, and the Operator will not be liable for damages caused by such events.
en.terms.6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
en.terms.6.p1.text: All intellectual property rights in the Site, including code, design, texts, graphics, trademarks, and trade secrets, are owned solely by the Operator. No copying, duplication, distribution, or use of content is permitted without prior written consent of the Operator.
en.terms.6.p2.text: The user is solely responsible for the content they shorten/upload and declares they do not infringe any third-party intellectual property rights.
en.terms.7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability and Indemnification
en.terms.7.p1.text: The Operator, its directors, employees, shareholders, and suppliers shall not be liable for any damages of any kind, direct or indirect, resulting from the use of the Site or Services, including outages, malfunctions, data loss, viruses, or reliance on content.
en.terms.7.p2.text: The user agrees to indemnify and compensate the Operator, its employees, and officers for any damage, loss, or expense (including attorney fees) caused by breach of the Terms, illegal use of the Services, or infringement of third-party rights.
en.terms.8.title: 8. Jurisdiction
en.terms.8.p1.text: These Terms and any dispute related to them shall be governed by the laws of the State of Israel only, with exclusive jurisdiction vested in the competent courts of the Tel Avivâ€“Jaffa district.
en.terms.9.title: 9. Full Agreement
en.terms.9.p1.text: Use of the Site constitutes full acknowledgment and acceptance of all conditions in this document.
